meanings.sent2: The rapid cooling of the metal hardened it quickly.
meanings.sent3: The cooling of the cake was necessary before adding frosting.
meanings.sent4: The cooling of the room was achieved by turning on the air conditioner.
meanings.sent5: The cooling of the laptop prevented it from overheating.
